1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Md. Abul Kalam

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: POCSO Case No. 106/2019                                    Order-sheet    Present: Sh. S.K. Poddar   Special Judge, Morigaon16.03.2020Majaharul Islam is present today with his engaged counsel. I have gone through the order dated 16.10.2019 passed by Ld. Principal Magistrate JJB, Morigaon by which the aforesaid accused was hold was child in conflict with law upon determining his age as 17 years 12 days on the date of occurrence. Considering above, let the case record with original case diary and FIR be placed before Ld. Principal Magistrate JJB, Morigaon to hold further inquiry u/s 15 of JJ Act and to proceed accordingly. Child in conflict with law is directed to appear before Principal Magistrate JJB on 01.04.2020 for further instruction. POCSO case is disposed of.
